attacks.name: Pollen Bomb
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Solar Typhoon
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Solar Typhoon.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Happy Match
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may put a Supporter card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Float Up
attacks.text: You may shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Quick Draw
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Grand Flame
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flare Blitzer
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Aqua Jet
attacks.text: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Draw Up
attacks.text: Attach up to 3 Water Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ocean Waves
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 120 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Solid Shell
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Powerful Bite
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

abilities.name: Solid Shell
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: G-Max Headbutt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Swelling Pulse
attacks.text: If this Pokémon was healed during this turn, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Max Cure
attacks.text: Heal 50 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Hazard Sensor
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Life Sucker
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Gnawing Aura
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from their hand to 1 of their Pokémon, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hollow Missile
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Sugary Sprinkles
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sweet Splash
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Adornment
attacks.text: For each of your Benched Pokémon, search your deck for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: G-Max Whisk
attacks.text: Discard any amount of Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Steady Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Pummel
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Macho Revenge
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each Fighting Pokémon in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Dynamite Punch
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.text: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Beatdown Smash
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Beatdown Smash.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.text: Discard a Fighting Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Slashing Strike.

attacks.name: Tie Up
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Moonsault Press
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Double-Edge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Wicked Ruler
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may have your opponent discard cards from their hand until they have 4 cards in their hand.

attacks.name: Knuckle Impact
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Bad Brawl
attacks.text: If you played Piers from your hand during this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Attack from Behind
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Confused, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Eerie Wave
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Random Peck
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Filch
attacks.text: Draw a card.

abilities.name: Hard Coat
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Gatling Slug
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Miraculous Charm
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon V and Pokémon-GX.

name: Bede
rules: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Full Heal
rules: Remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Great Ball
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Pokémon you find there and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Hop
rules: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Hyper Potion
rules: Heal 120 damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has at least 2 Energy attached. If you healed any damage in this way, discard 2 Energy from it.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Kabu
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If your Active Pokémon is your only Pokémon in play, draw 8 cards instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Marnie
rules: Each player shuffles their hand and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If either player put any cards on the bottom of their deck in this way, you draw 5 cards, and your opponent draws 4 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Milo
rules: Discard up to 2 cards from your hand, and draw 2 cards for each card you discarded in this way.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Piers
rules: Search your deck for an Energy card and a Darkness Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Poké Ball
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Pokémon Center Lady
rules: Heal 60 damage and remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Potion
rules: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Professor's Research
rules: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rotom Bike
rules: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand. Your turn ends.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rotom Phone
rules: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and shuffle the other cards back into your deck. Then, put the card you chose on top of your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Sonia
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon or up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Suspicious Food Tin
rules: Heal 80 damage from 1 of your Pokémon that has at least 1 Psychic Energy attached. If you healed any damage in this way, discard a Psychic Energy from it.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Team Yell Grunt
rules: Put an Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon into their hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Turffield Stadium
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may search their deck for an Evolution Grass Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into their hand. Then, that player shuffles their deck.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.
